category.title: French Toast
category.description: Sliced challah bread dipped in our homemade egg batter, grilled to perfection. Served with Vermont maple syrup and butter. Substitute gluten-free bread ($2.00).

meals.title: Le Petit Pain Grille
meals.description: Topped with roasted coconut, fresh diced pineapple and melted mascarpone cheese.

meals.title: Paris
meals.description: Topped with melted mascarpone cheese, roasted pears and house made caramel sauce.

meals.title: La Tour Eiffel
meals.description: Topped with Nutella, bananas, strawberries topped with melted mascarpone cheese.

meals.title: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
meals.description: Choose any one meat to finish your sandwich. Choose bacon, sausage, turkey, ham or smoked salmon for $2.50 more.

meals.title: The Empire
meals.description: Two eggs omelette style, melted swiss cheese, asparagus, zucchini, and bacon.

meals.title: Signature Sandwich
meals.description: Apple wood smoked bacon, egg homemade corned beef hash, melted cheddar cheese and crispy home fries all piled high on a brioche bun.

meals.title: The Lox
meals.description: Bagel, egg, fresh tomato, sliced red onion, smoked salmon, cream cheese spread, and capers.

meals.title: Bruschetta (v)
meals.description: Egg, avocado, balsamic glaze, sliced tomatoes, extra virgen olive oil, garlic aioli and fresh basil

meals.title: Belgian Waffle
meals.description: Served with Vermont maple syrup and butter. Add fruit to your waffle $1.25 each. (Banana, strawberry, blueberry, roasted coconut, pecans, chocolate chips, pineapple and nutella).

meals.title: ‘Loaded’ Home Fries
meals.description: Home fries tossed with mushrooms, sausage, peppers, sun dried tomatoes and onions, with melted cheddar cheese topped with two eggs any style and a lemon zest hollandaise sauce.

meals.title: Huevos Rancheros
meals.description: Two eggs any style topped w/onions, peppers, melted  cheddar cheese. With black beans, sausa, sour cream, guacamole and tortillas on the side.

meals.title: Early Bird
meals.description: 6AM to 8AM ONLY, M-F. Two eggs any style, bacon, sausage or ham, served with a choice of home fries or tossed salad. Served with house toast and a cup of coffee.

meals.title: Flat Iron Steak
meals.description: 6oz flat iron steak, 3 eggs any style, home fries or tossed salad served with choice of toast.

meals.title: The Grand Slam!
meals.description: Our best special offer! 2 eggs any style, 2 bacon strips, 2 sausage with a choice of 2 slices of french toast or 2 pancakes, home fries or tossed salad and a cup of coffee.

meals.title: Custom Breakfast
meals.description: Three eggs any style choose bacon, signature sausage or ham, served with house toast and home fries or tossed salad.
